segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) supports a number of different deployment configurations.
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) supports a number of different deployment configurations.

segment.source: This section includes information that you should consider about the deployment of MBAM and step-by-step procedures to help you successfully perform the tasks that you must complete at different stages of your deployment.
segment.target: This section includes information that you should consider about the deployment of MBAM and step-by-step procedures to help you successfully perform the tasks that you must complete at different stages of your deployment.

segment.source: You can deploy MBAM either in a Stand-alone topology, or with a topology that integrates MBAM with Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager 2007 or Microsoft System Center 2012 Configuration Manager.
segment.target: You can deploy MBAM either in a Stand-alone topology, or with a topology that integrates MBAM with Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager 2007 or Microsoft System Center 2012 Configuration Manager.

segment.source: For information about installing MBAM with the Configuration Manager integrated topology, see Using MBAM with Configuration Manager.
segment.target: For information about installing MBAM with the Configuration Manager integrated topology, see Using MBAM with Configuration Manager.

segment.source: This section describes the different MBAM deployment topology options and how to use MBAM Setup to deploy MBAM Server features.
segment.target: This section describes the different MBAM deployment topology options and how to use MBAM Setup to deploy MBAM Server features.

segment.source: This section describes how to create and deploy MBAM Group Policy Objects that are required for managing MBAM Clients and BitLocker encryption policies throughout the enterprise.
segment.target: This section describes how to create and deploy MBAM Group Policy Objects that are required for managing MBAM Clients and BitLocker encryption policies throughout the enterprise.

segment.source: This section describes how to use the MBAM Client Installer files to deploy the MBAM Client software.
segment.target: This section describes how to use the MBAM Client Installer files to deploy the MBAM Client software.

segment.source: This section provides a deployment checklist that can be used to assist in MBAM Server feature and MBAM Client deployment.
segment.target: This section provides a deployment checklist that can be used to assist in MBAM Server feature and MBAM Client deployment.

segment.source: Upgrading from Previous Versions of MBAM
segment.target: Upgrading from Previous Versions of MBAM

segment.source: This section provides instructions for upgrading MBAM from previous versions.
segment.target: This section provides instructions for upgrading MBAM from previous versions.

segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring 2 Administrator's Guide
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring 2 Administrator's Guide
